text: Atrivim Hesekia ofa gamir gumaziba ko, Livaiba tuiragha, men ikɨziba vaghvagh damuamin ingangaribar me arɨgha, me mɨgɨa ghaze, ia ofa gamir gumaziba ko, Livain ikɨziba fomɨra ingarizɨ moghɨn ia ingangaribar amu. Ingangarir kaba: Me ofan bar isia mɨghɨriba ko, God ko navir vamɨran ikiamin ofabagh amua, Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨnabava, an ziam fava, an Dɨpenimɨn ingangariba bar dagh ami.
